game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a powerful artifact hidden within the lost city of Eldarath. The artifact is said to grant immense power and knowledge to its possessor. Your quest is to navigate through the treacherous jungle, overcome deadly traps, and retrieve the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 500 gold coins, a magical amulet, and a boost in reputation

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city from local villagers
task.description: Speak to the villagers in Oakwood and gather as much information as possible about the location and layout of the lost city.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle to reach the ruins of Eldarath
task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle, avoiding deadly creatures and obstacles along the way.

task.objective: Overcome traps and puzzles to reach the artifact chamber
task.description: Solve complex puzzles and overcome deadly traps to reach the chamber where the artifact is hidden.
